DOC.brief_summary: This study is proposed to evaluate Sebacia Microparticle treatment in patients with facial inflammatory acne vulgaris.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Sebacia Microparticles in Patients With Inflammatory Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: 1. Male or female, 1645 years of age. 2. Moderate to moderatelysevere facial inflammatory acne vulgaris 3. Fitzpatrick skin phototype IIII 1. Pregnant, lactating, nursing or planning to become pregnant 2. Tattoo in the treatment area 3. Active skin disease, excessive scarring or excess facial hair in the treatment area 4. Certain current or recent acne treatments 5. Recent light treatments including Intense Pulsed Light or other lasers, microdermabrasion or chemical peels in the treatment area 6. Contraindicated for laser treatment, or is unable or unwilling to avoid excessive sun exposure or tanning bed use 7. Known allergy to gold
